FuncDef: The active port-license command activates a hardware license for an interface. The active port-license command activates a hardware license for an interface. By default, the license is not activated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the license type of an interface.
The options are as follows:
25G50G200G400G

Specifies the name of an interface.
You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value based on the prompt.

Specifies the interface type.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Specifies an interface number.
You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value based on the prompt.

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies an interface number.
The value of interface-number2 must not be less than that of interface-number1.

ExtraInfo: You can purchase hardware licenses on demand to reduce the initial investment. In the future, you can purchase hardware licenses for capacity expansion as services increase, facilitating flexible consumption.
